title: Lead lawyer quits Trump's Russia team
text:
Lead lawyer quits Trump's Russia team 2:42am IST - 01:30 
Attorney John Dowd has stepped down from Trump's legal team after disagreeing with the President on how to respond to the Russia investigation. The shakeup comes as House Democrats warn Trump not to fire special counsel Robert Mueller. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Attorney John Dowd has stepped down from Trump's legal team after disagreeing with the President on how to respond to the Russia investigation. The shakeup comes as House Democrats warn Trump not to fire special counsel Robert Mueller.
